title: AMA ...3.0?

replies.body: Ay! Beach or Snow and why?

replies.body: How do you get your name?

replies.body: Where were you for the past two months? :3
replies.body_tagged: Where were you for the past two months? :3

replies.body:
@Whale_Warrior 
I think the "evil" part was because of my personality (I was in a bad place :p) I replaced the "s" in "Chris" with a "z" and "zillah" was because I liked dinosaurs :3

@JKawesome Some issues with my life/friends, and high school. But I'm better now :D
